text:
Beta Caryophyllene (BCP): #Cancer-Fighting #Terpene: https://t.co/NTMOKTweM6

"BCP is present in oregano, cloves, hops, and #cannabis. First synthesized in 1964, in 2008 its #cannabinoid properties were discovered. It targets CB2 receptors, ignoring CB1."

#LearnAndTeachOthers https://t.co/ECj80LfcSY
